      • createConnectionWithServer

        private lib.communication.ClientCom createConnectionWithServer​()
                                                        throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Creates a connection to the correspondent server (meaning the Stable).
        Returns:
        the communication with the server, already defined over a ClientCom object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if a connection could not be established with success.
